pullrequest.title: Don't call dlclose on osx, since it seems to cause seg-faults (#1026)

content.raw:
Let's consider this as a workaround, which is going to cause side effects but they probably hurt less than the current problem with segfaults. 

Not calling [dlclose](http://linux.die.net/man/3/dlclose) will probably make that the plugins won't be unloaded from the memory. I'm ok with this for the moment, but I would prefer any kind of comment or \todo so we don't forget about the issue.
content.html:
Let's consider this as a workaround, which is going to cause side effects but they probably hurt less than the current problem with segfaults.

Not calling dlclose will probably make that the plugins won't be unloaded from the memory. I'm ok with this for the moment, but I would prefer any kind of comment or \todo so we don't forget about the issue.
